General.Name: Huamei Holding
General.Description: Zhejiang Huamei Holding CO.,LTD. primarily engages in the advertising services. The company is involved in the newspaper, online, outdoor, radio broadcast, and other forms of advertisements; newspaper distribution; and printing of books, newspapers, advertising leaflets, periodicals, packaging products, and digital graphic products for other government agencies, enterprises, and institutions. It also provides vocational, international, IT, art, online vocational, and preschool education services; exhibition and marketing services; industrial investments; new media technology development services; and logistics and distribution services. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Huazhi Holdings Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Huamei Holding CO.,LTD. in December 2011. Zhejiang Huamei Holding CO.,LTD. was founded in 1993 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jianqiang  Gao
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
